thread.title: GoodData Rated a Leader in Agile BI
thread.title_full: GoodData Rated a Leader in Agile BI

author: admin
title: GoodData Rated a Leader in Agile BI
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 6:00 AM   GoodData 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/28/15 -- GoodData , the leading provider of business intelligence for data monetization to enterprises and ISVs, today announced it was cited as a Leader in the The Forrester Wave: Agile Business Intelligence Platforms, Q3 2015 report by Forrester Research, Inc. In this evaluation, GoodData earned the highest scores possible for client feedback and vendor commitment, as well as among top-three highest scores for IT-enabled and self-service features within the current offering category (second and third highest, respectively). 
The Forrester Wave on Agile BI is based on scores for strength of current offerings, strategy and market presence. The report states that "the agile BI market is growing as application development and delivery professionals focus on supporting business agility" and that "business user BI self-service is the key differentiator in the agile BI market." 
"We know that an engaging and self-service experience is table stakes to enable end-users to be successful," said GoodData Founder and CEO Roman Stanek. "We are pleased Forrester Research has recognized what we consider to be GoodData's powerful guided analytics experience and secure, scalable platform, which are key drivers of platform adoption and engagement." 
According to Forrester Research in the Agile BI Wave, "GoodData appeals to buyers who are looking for a single Agile and integrated enterprise end-to-end BI platform that resides in the cloud, and therefore, takes the burden of maintenance, support, and upgrades away from enterprise technology professionals." 
"We want to give contact centers answers, not reports. They need to create their own metrics. GoodData's power and flexibility is speeding time to insight and winning us business," said Bolder Thinking VP of Product Development Nicole Hushka. 
"It takes a powerful engine to handle the data demands of a company of our size. GoodData went beyond traditional BI solutions, taking us from zero-to-insight in record time," said Discovery Communications Director of Analytics, Param Ghangas. 
About GoodData GoodData ® provides groundbreaking BI for data monetization to enterprises, independent software vendors, and system integrators who seek to quickly create and distribute valuable, targeted analytics across their business networks. Our real-time analytics distribution platform is highly scalable and secure -- allowing companies like Target, Discovery International and Zendesk to deploy engaging data products that are guided by GoodData's expertise in delivering widely-adopted analytics solutions. 
GoodData is headquartered in San Francisco and is backed by Andreessen Horowitz, General Catalyst Partners, Intel Capital, TOTVS and others. For more information, read our blog , visit our website and follow GoodData on Twitter and LinkedIn .
